ability.Terrifying Presence: Upon entry, lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
ability.Mystic Cry: Has a 30% chance to confuse the attacker when this Pokemon is hit by a move.

Jade Shard.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Serpent Dance.effect: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

Echoing Cry.effect: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target and is always critical if the target is already confused.
